data.title: Lippmann, Jonas Ferdinand Gabriel 1845–1921
data.meta_description: Jonas Ferdinand Gabriel Lippmann was a French inventor and physicist (born in Luxembourg) who created the first color photographs using what was certainly the first spectral imaging system.
